name: gel
description: The Westpac GEL Design System components, brand tokens and website monorepo
author: Westpac GEL Team <gel@westpac.com.au>

scripts.nuke:node_modules: find ./components -type d -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./brands -type d -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test: yarn test:format && yarn test:unit && yarn test:integration
scripts.dep:test: manypkg check && preconstruct build || preconstruct dev
scripts.postinstall: yarn dep:test && preconstruct dev && yarn GELjson && build-field-types dev
scripts.publish-packages: yarn build && yarn GELjson && yarn changeset publish
scripts.deploy:staging:msg:
echo "If you made changes to the nginx config follow below steps:

1. Log into the server: \x1b[33mssh deploy@165.22.110.244\x1b[0m
2. Copy the file: \x1b[33msudo cp /srv/pm2-apps/gel3-website/source/nginx/gel3-keystone-routes.conf /etc/nginx/snippets/gel3-keystone-routes.conf\x1b[0m
3. Test the new config: \x1b[33msudo nginx -t\x1b[0m
4. If there are errors correct them in this repo and start again from scratch by running \x1b[33myarn deploy:staging\x1b[0m
5. If all is well run \x1b[33msudo nginx -s reload\x1b[0m
6. ✨ Done
"
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn deploy:staging:sync && yarn deploy:staging:restart && yarn deploy:staging:msg
scripts.deploy:live:msg:
echo "If you made changes to the nginx config follow below steps:

1. Log into the server: \x1b[33mssh deploy@128.199.200.220\x1b[0m
2. Copy the file: \x1b[33msudo cp /srv/pm2-apps/gel3-website/source/nginx/gel3-keystone-routes.conf /etc/nginx/snippets/gel3-keystone-routes.conf\x1b[0m
3. Test the new config: \x1b[33msudo nginx -t\x1b[0m
4. If there are errors correct them in this repo and start again from scratch by running \x1b[33myarn deploy:live\x1b[0m
5. If all is well run \x1b[33msudo nginx -s reload\x1b[0m
6. ✨ Done
"
scripts.deploy:live: yarn deploy:live:sync && yarn deploy:live:restart && yarn deploy:live:msg
